Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Transform
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
public final class Transform extends Object implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
Position and orientation of an entity local to a parent transform.

    • Transform

      public Transform(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 position, dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector1 orientation, Transform parent, boolean rotatesWithParent)
      Constructs a new transform.
      Parameters:
      position - initial position
      orientation - radians along x-y plane from the +x axis
      parent - parent transform
      rotatesWithParent - true means this transform is effectively "glued" to its position on parent and follows rotational position accordingly

  • Method Details

    • getPosition

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 getPosition()
      Returns:
      position relative to parent transform

    • getGlobalPosition

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 getGlobalPosition()
      Returns:
      position relative to the root transform

    • getOrientation

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector1 getOrientation()
      Returns:
      orientation relative to parent

    • getGlobalOrientation

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector1 getGlobalOrientation()
      Returns:
      orientation relative to the nearest ancestor which does not rotatesWithParent

    • setParent

      public Transform setParent(Transform parent, boolean rotatesWithParent)
      Parameters:
      parent - parent to which this transform's position (and optionally, orientation) are relative to
      rotatesWithParent - true means this transform's orientation is evaluated relative to parent
      Returns:
      this
